pages.text: And warn them of the Day of Sighs (Anguish, Regret, Distress) when the matter is determined. Now they are heedless, and believe not
Verily, We will inherit the earth and all who are upon it, and unto Us shall they return
And mention Abraham in the Book; verily, he was a saint (a man of truth, a true witness), a prophet
When he said to his father, "O my sire! Why do you worship what can neither hear nor see nor avail you aught
O my Sire! Verily, to me has come knowledge which has not come to you; so follow me, and I will guide you to a Straight and Level Way
O my Sire! Serve not Satan; verily, Satan is ever a rebel against the Beneficent One
O my Sire! Verily, I fear that there may afflict you punishment from the Beneficent One, and that you may be a comrade (or client) of Satan
Said he, "What! Do you reject (or hate) my gods, O Abraham? Verily, if you do not desist I will certainly stone you; but get you gone from me for a long time
Said he, "Peace be upon you! I will ask forgiveness for you from my Lord. Verily, He is to me most gracious
I will part from you and what you call on beside Allah, and will pray unto my Lord. It may be that in my prayer unto my Lord, I shall not be unblest
And when he had parted from them and what they served beside Allah, We granted him Isaac and Jacob, and each of them We made a prophet
And We bestowed on them of Our Mercy, and We granted them lofty honour on (or from) the tongue of truth
And mention Moses in the Book; verily, he was chosen, and was a Messenger, a prophet
